page.title: 09CLUBS
page.content: CLUBS. There are several clubs in the area. The Women's Institute is for members in Ducis and Everleigh. Meetings are held held every month in the School. This institute was formed in 1973. There are 35 members. The president is Mrs. M. Harrison, who has held the post for two years. The newest club is the Cricket Club formed in 1984. In that year they fielded one team mainly for Sunday games, but this year they have formed a Colts side and have entered competitions in a league and Wilts Cup. The Blue Lion sponsors a football team which plays in the Andover Sunday League. They have been reformed as the Collingbourne Lions.
